title: Failure of German unification 16th and 17th cent

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the factors that prevented the development of a unified German state in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries.

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
